name: Chocolate Chip Cake
author: Annita Layton
instructions: Grease and flour 9 x 13 inch pan or 2 round layer pans. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt into bowl. Add shortening, milk, and vanilla. Beat 2 minutes on medium speed. Scrape sides and bot- tom of bowl constantly. Add egg whites. Beat 2 more minutes. Care- fully fold in chocolate chips. Pour into prepared pans. Bake at 350Â° 30 to 35 minutes for layers and 40 to 45 minutes for oblong.
